articles.title: Pune: Experts discuss ways to boost resilience in a post-Covid world - The Indian Express
articles.description: Educating people on vaccines is critical, says vaccine expert Dr Stanley Plotkin, while Dr Krishna Ella of Bharat Biotech said we must be able to predict and prepare for 5-6 diseases. They were speaking at the Asia Economic Dialogue.
